duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide mentorship on a transition from the legacy system (Summit) to Calypso.
Work in Agile development teams on backlog stories to develop/improve/customize the Calypso application.
Analyze business requirements and propose technical solutions.
Collaborate with business analysts, traders, and technology teams to capture and understand requirements for Calypso-based solutions.
Craft and develop customizations and extensions to the Calypso platform to meet specific business needs.
Implement and notate Calypso workflows, trade processing, and risk management functionalities.
Integrate Calypso with other systems and platforms, ensuring detailed data flow and accuracy.
Write and maintain reports, dashboards, and analytics using Calypso's reporting tools.
Participate in code reviews, testing, debugging.
Keep up to date with Calypso updates, industry trends, and emerging technologies in the banking and financial services domain.
Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and practices.
Assist in quality control, encourage best practices, always aiming to go above and beyond stakeholder satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
